html:
{%- for sup in doc.suppliers -%}
{%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif -%}

REQUEST FOR QUOTATION

{%- if doc.items[0].cost_center -%} {{ doc.items[0].cost_center }} {%- endif -%}
RFQ#: {{doc.name}} Date: {{ doc.transaction_date }}
To:

{{ sup.supplier }}
{{ sup.location }}
Tel:{{ sup.phone }}
Email: {{ sup.email_id }}
Attention Person: {{sup.attention_person}}

Dear Sir/Madam,

{{doc.header_text}}

{%- if doc.terms -%} {{ doc.terms }} {%- endif -%}

PRICE SCHEDULE

The Bidder shall quote as per the Price Schedule below: {%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sl. No Material Code Name Specification UoM Qty Rate
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_code }} {{ row.item_name }} {{ row.description }} {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Item Group", frappe.db.get_value("Item", {"name": row.item_code}, "item_group")) -%} {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Item", {"name": row.item_code}, "item_sub_group") -%}
({{frappe.db.get_value("Item", {"name": row.item_code}, "item_sub_group")}}) {%- endif -%} {%- endif -%}{%- if row.notes -%}
Specification:
{{ row.notes}} {%- endif -%}		 {{ row.uom }} {{ row.qty }}

{%- if doc.footer_text -%} {{ doc.footer_text }} {%- endif -%}
This print is system generated and should be considered VALID only with appropriate seal and/or signature.
Printed by {{ frappe.user }} on {{ frappe.utils.nowdate() }} at {{ frappe.utils.nowtime() }}
{%- endfor -%}
{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}
name: All Suppliers
